content.title: 🎉 Thanks! HackCable Kickstarter Campaign: A Huge Success! 🚀 Late Pledge Available!
content.creator:
Geeky Labs
February 17, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
We did it! 🎉 Our HackCable Kickstarter campaign has officially ended, and it wouldn’t have been possible without your amazing support and love. Your enthusiasm and belief in HackCable helped us bring this project to life, and we are beyond grateful for each and every one of you!
What’s Next?
We are now moving forward with production and fulfillment to ensure that you receive your HackCable as soon as possible. We’ll keep you updated on the progress and shipping timeline. Stay tuned for more exciting updates!
Missed the Campaign? No Worries!
If you or someone you know missed out on the Kickstarter, you can still grab HackCable through Late Pledge! 🔥 Don’t miss this final opportunity to get your hands on it.
👉 Late Pledge Now
Once again, THANK YOU for being a part of this journey! We can't wait to get HackCable into your hands. 🙌
Stay awesome,
The HackCable Team

content.title: Get Free Exclusive HackCable Resources – Limited to 200 Backers, Offer Available for 24 Hours!
content.creator:
Geeky Labs
February 6, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
Thank you for your incredible support! We’re excited to announce a special 24-hour offer 🎉 – We’re giving all the resources for using HackCable completely FREE to the first 200 backers!
To claim your exclusive resources, simply fill out the survey below:
📋 Fill Out the Survey
⏳ Hurry! This offer is only valid for the next 24 hours. Secure your spot before it’s gone!
Stay tuned for more exciting updates, and thank you for being a part of our journey.
Best,
Team Geeky Labs

comments.text: This is kind of irritating to say the least. You all release that email at 9:13 pm Pacific standard Time. I clicked on the link at 9:14 p.m. Pacific standard Time and entered all my information. However, it seems it is not working.

I filled out my information as soon as this was released. It is not allowing me to complete any survey. It only allows me to put in my information including my email. I have tried about a dozen times now please advise.
Dear Will, Ensure that you have clicked the submit button. That’s all the information we need for now to gauge interest. If that's done, Congratulations on being part of the first 200 backers!

content.title: Thanks to YOU! 🎉
content.creator:
Geeky Labs
January 22, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
We’re beyond thrilled to share that HackCable Built-in Wi-Fi - USB-C Keystroke Injection Cable has exceeded its funding goal! Your incredible support and enthusiasm have made this possible, and we couldn’t be more grateful. ❤️
Now, let’s take this journey further together! Help us expand the HackCable Family by sharing this campaign with your friends, family, and on your social media platforms. Your shares can help us reach even more people who would love this innovative, fully programmable, undetectable, and universally compatible tool.
🔗 Click here to share the campaign
Together, we can make HackCable an essential tool for developers, ethical hackers, and tech enthusiasts everywhere.
Let’s keep the momentum going! 🚀
With gratitude,
The HackCable Team
